juzs.text: (nabivaraya) kumak pilibandava da ovun taman atara vimasa sitinuye
mahangu vu aramciya pilibandava ya
eya ovun bheda binna vi siti dæya
noeseya. ovuhu matu dæna gannoya
yali noeseya. ovuhu matu dæna gannoya
api mahapolova ætirillak lesa pat nokalemu da
tavada kandu, kunna lesa da (pat nokalemu da)
tavada api numbala va (stri purusa lesa) yugala vasayen nomævvemu da
tavada api numbalage ninda vivekayak bavata pat nokalemu da
tavada api ratriya avaranayak bavata pat nokalemu da
tavada api dahavala jivanopaya (salasa gannak) bavata pat nokalemu da
tavada api numbalata ihalin saktimat (ahas) hatak idi nokalemu da
tavada api diptiyen dælvena pahanak bavata (suryaya) pat nokalemu da
tavada api megha valavangen (væsi) jalaya adhika lesa pahala nokalemu da
emagin dhanya (varga) ha vrksalata da hata ganu pinisa
turu patarin gahana (sarusara) uyan da (hata ganu pinisa)
niyata vasayenma tiranatmaka dinayata (adala) kalaya niyama vi æta
sur (horanæva) pimbinu labana dinaye di numbala kandayam vasayen pæminenu æta
tavada ahasa vivrta karanu læbe. evita eya doratu bavata pat vanu æta
kandu (tibu tæn valin) ivat karanu læbe. evita eya miringuvak men vanu æta
niyata vasayenma niraya pahara dena sthanayak viya
(eya) simava ikmava yannavun sandaha navatænak vasayeni
ehi ovuhu yuga gananavakma veseti
ovuhu ehi sisila ho panaya ho rasa novinditi
natana unu diya saha (niraye væsiyange vana) særava misa. (vena kisivak næta)
(ese ovunata læbenuye) sudusu pratiphalayak vasayeni
niyata vasayenma ovuhu viniscaya apeksa nokaramin sitiyaha
tavada ovuhu apage vadan dædi lesa boru yæyi pavasamin pratiksepa kaloya
tavada api sæma deyakma likhita va lekhanayehi satahan kalemu
“ebævin numbala rasa vindinu. evita kisiviteka danduvama misa (an kisivak) api numbalata vædi nokarannemu.” (yæyi niraye væsiyanta pavasanu læbe)
niyata vasayenma biya bætimatunta jayagrahanaya da æta
vatu ha midi da (æta)
tavada piyayuru nera giya sama vayase kanyavan da (sititi)
(panavalin) pirunu kusalana da æta
nisphala katha bahak ho (ovunovun atara) kisidu boru kirimak ho ehi ovuhu sravanaya nokarati
(eya) numbage paramadhipatigen vu pramanavat dayadayak vana pratiphalayaki
(eya) ahashi da mahapolovehi da e deka atara pavatina dæhi da paramadhipatiyanan vana aparimita dayanvitayanangeni. (ohu idiriye) katha kirimata ohugen ovun (kisiveku)ta balaya nomæta
ruh (jibril) ha malak (devaduta)varun pela gæsi nægita sitina dina. (edina) aparimita dayanvitaya anumætiya dun keneku ha satya dæ katha karanneku misa (an kisivek) katha nokarayi
eyamaya satyaya vu dinayayi. ebævin yamek abhimata karanneda ohu tama rab (paramadhipati) veta apasu yana margaya tora ganitva

niyata vasayenma samipayen pavatina danduvama pilibanda va api numbalata avavada kalemu. edina minisa tama deat peratu kala dæ dæka gani. tavada pratiksepa karanna, “aho ! ma pas bavata pat viya yutu novem dæ”yi pavasayi
sahasika lesa (dustayange pranaya) galavannan mata divuramin
tavada mrdu lesa galavannan mata da divuramin
(kærunika kriyavanhi) pavemin pihinannan mata da divuramin
tarangakari lesa taranga vadinnan mata da (divuramin)
tavada katayutu sælasum karannan mata da (divuramin)
edina mahat kampanayakin (lova) kampanaya ve
eyata anupilivelin kampanaya nævata sidu vanu æta
edina hadavat (biyen) tæti ganiyi
ovunge bælma biyen pavati
“niyata vasayenma api pera tattvayatama nævata haravanu labannno vannemudæ” yi ovuhu pavasati
“apa dira giya asthi bavata patvuye nam da?”
“ese nam eya alabhavanta hærimaki” yæyi ovuhu pavasati
ehet eya ek bhayanaka handak pamani
evita ovuhu (viniscaya sandaha) elimahan tænaka sititi
musage toraturu (nabivaraya) obata læbuneda
ohuge paramadhipati ohu va tuva nam parisuddha nimnayehi æmatu vita
oba firavun veta yanu. niyata vasayenma ohu simava ikmava gos æta
evita oba pivituru vimata obata (kæmættak) ætdæyi vimasanu
tavada ma numbata manga penvannemi. evita numba numbage paramadhipatita biyabætimat veyi
evita ohu (musa) ohuta maha salakuna penviya
namut ohu (firavun eya)boru yæyi pavasa (ohuta)pitupæveya
pasu va (ohugen ven vi) pasu bæsa gos (ohuta hani kirimata) væyam kaleya
evita ohu (ohuge janaya) ræs kota (ovun va) æmatuveya
evita “mama numbalage usas paramadhipati vemi“ yæyi ohu pævasuveya
eheyin allah melova ha paralova danduvamata ohu va hasu kara gatteya
niyata vasayenma (allahta) biyavannekuta ehi padamak æta
mævimata balavat vanne numbala da nætahot ahasa da? eya ohu(allah) nirmanaya kaleya
ohu ehi viyana osava pasu va eya niværadi va sækasuveya
tavada ohu ehi ratriya (anduren) avaranaya kara ehi dahavala heli kaleya
tavada mahapolova in pasuva (niyamakarayen) ohu eya diga hæriyeya
ohu eyin ehi æti jalaya da ehi æti tanabim da bihi kaleya
tavada kandu eya ohu sthavarava sthapita kaleya
(eya) numbalata ha numbalage govipala satunta bhukti vindimak vasayeni
ehet mahat vyasanaya pæmini vita
edina minisa taman (melova) prayatna dæru dæ sihipat karanneya
tavada narambannanhata niraya pratyaksa karanu labayi
eheyin simava ullamghanaya kara
melova jivitaya tora gat aya vu kali
sæbævinma niraya vana eyamaya (ovunge) nivahana vanne
tavada tama paramadhipatige sannidhana(ye peni sitima)ta biya vi tama atmaya asavangen valakva gat aya vu kali
sæbævinma svargaya vana eyamaya (ovunge) nivahana vanne
ema horava eya kavada siduvanne dæyi ovuhu obagen vimasati
e pilibanda pævasimata obata kuma(na balaya)k tibeda
ehi avasan tinduva numbage paramadhipati veta ya
e pilibanda biya vannanta sæbævinma numba avavada karannek pamani
sæbævinma ovun edina (eya dakina vita) savas kalayak ho diva kalayak ho misa (lovehi) rændi nositiyak men sitanu æta
ohu muhuna hakula hæruneya
(ese sidu kale) andhayeku taman veta pæminima hetu kotagena (ya)
ohu pivituru vanu ætæyi oba va dænuvat karanuye kumak da
ese nætahot ohu (obe upades) menehi kara ema menehi kirima ohuta yahapatak vanu ætæyi (oba va dænuvat karanuye kumak da)
(yahamaga pilibanda) avasyatava nomæti aya vu kali
numba ohu vetata avadhanaya yomu karannehiya
tavada ohu pivituru novima gæna oba kerehi dosak nomæta
tavada oba veta kæpavimen pæmini aya pilibanda vu kali
biya bætimat vi
oba ohu pilibanda nosalaka hæriyehi ya
ese nova sæbævinma eya sihivatanayaki
eheyin kavarek (sumaga yannata) abhimata kaleda ohu eya menehi karatva
(mema vadan) gauravaniya pustakayehi ya
pavitra vu usas (pustakayehi ya)
(malakvarunge) atvalin (liyana laddaki)
gauravanvita, pivituru dæhæmi (malakvarunge) atvalin (liyana laddaki)
minisata sapaya at veva ! ohu va pratiksepakayeku bavata pat kale kumak da
kumana deyakin ohu va ohu(allah) mævve da
ohu(allah minisa vana) ohu va sukranu binduvakin mava pasuva ohu va pramanavat lesa sækasuveya
anaturuva ohuta (jivana) margaya pahasu kaleya
pasu va ohu ohu va maranayata pat kaleya. inpasuva ohu ohu va vala dæmuveya
pasu va ohu abhimata vu vita ohu ohu va nægituvanneya
noeseya. ohu ohuta ana kala dæ ohu itu nokaleya
ebævin minisa ohuge aharaya desa balatva
sæbævinma api (varsa) jalaya adhika vasayen hæluvemu
pasu va api polova pælmak vasayen pæluvemu
ehi bija da api hata gænvuyemu
midi ha elavalu da (hata gænvuyemu)
oliv ha rataindi gas da
ghana uyan da
palaturu ha udupiyaliya da (api hata gænvuyemu)
(me siyalla) numbalata da numbalage govipala satunta da rasa vindimak vasayeni
ebævin maha handa pæmini vita
edina minisa ohuge sahodarayagen da pala yanu æta
ohuge mava ha ohuge piyagen da (pala yanu æta)
ohuge bharyava ha ohuge daruvangen da (pala yanu æta)
edina ovun aturin sæma minisekutama ohu va nirata karavana karunu æta
edina (ætæm) muhunu pæhæpat va pavati
sinaha musu va pritiyen (pavati)
tavada (ætæm) muhunu edina eva mata duvili pavati
andura eva vasa ganu æta
ovuhumaya pratiksepa kala dustayo
hiru hakulanu labana vita
tavada taru kada hælunu vita
tavada kandu gaman karavanu labana vita
tavada gæbbara otu denun atahæra damanu labana vita
tavada vana satun ræs karanu labana vita
tavada muhudu giniganu labana vita
tavada atmavo (eyata samana atmavan samanga) sambandha karanu labana vita
tavada pana pitin valalanu læbu gæhænu daruvo vimasanu læbu vita
taman kumana papayak nisa ghatanaya karanu læbuvo dæyi? vimasanu labana vita
tavada (honda naraka liyavunu) lekhana diga harinu læbu vita
tavada ahasa niravaranaya karanu læbu vita
tavada niraya molavanu læbu vita
tavada (deva visvasavantayin veta) svargaya samipa karavanu læbu vita
atmaya taman idiripat kara æti dæ kumakdæyi dæna ganu æta
ebævin gaman karana grahatarakava mata divurami
sænga vi nopeni (yana grahatarakava mata divurami)
ratriya eya gevi yana vita e mata divuramin
peravaruva eya uda vi pavatina vita e mata divuramin
niyata vasayenma meya gauravaniya dutayakuge vadana ve
(ohu) balayen yukta (ya.) sthavara va pavatina arshi himikaru abiyasa sitina
tavada yatahat vanu labana visvasavanta, (dutayakuge vadana ve)
tavada (janayini) numbalage sagaya (muhammad) unmattakayeku nove
tavada sæbævinma ohu ohu va pæhædili ksitijayehi dutuveya
tavada ohu (gupta dæ) sangavana masureku nove
tavada eya palava harina lada seyitange vadanak nove
ebævin numbala kohe yannehu da
eya lovæsiyanata menehi kirimak misa næta
numbala aturin kavarek srju margaya pætimata abhimata karanne da ohutaya
tavada lo væsiyange paramadhipati vana allah abhimata karanne nam misa, numbala abhimata nokarannehuya
ahasa pipiri ven va giya vita
tavada tarukavan væti visiri giya vita
tavada samudrayan pupura yana vita
tavada mini valaval (e tula tænpat kara æti mala mini) perala damanu labana vita
sæma atmayak ma taman idiripat kala ha pasuvata itiri kala dæ dæna ganu æta
aho minisa! gauravaniya numbage paramadhipati pilibanda va numba va mammula kale kumak da
(numbage paramadhipativu) ohu numba va mava pasuva numbava usas andamata nirmanaya kara (obe hædaruva) niyamita akarayata sækasuveya
kavara rupayakin numba va hæda gæsvimata ohu abhimata kale da e ayurin numbava mævveya
no eseya, namut numbala viniscaya pilibanda boru karannehuya
niyata vasayenma numbala mata (malaikavarun vana) araksakayin æta
(ovuhu) gauravaniya lekhakayo veti
ovuhu numbala karana dæ pilibanda dannoya
niyata vasayenma dæhæmiyan suva sæpayehi ya
tavada niyata vasayenma adharmisthayin nirayehi ya
viniscaya dinaye ovuhu ehi pivisennoya
tavada ovuhu (nopæmina) eyin sængavi sitinnan noveti
vinisca dinaya kumak dæyi numba va dænuvat kale kumak da
pasu va da vinisca dinaya kumak dæyi numba va dænuvat kale kumak da
edina atmayak tavat atmayakata kisivakin (ho pihitavime) balaya nodaranu æta. edina siyalu karunu allah veta ya
kirum minum vala vamca karannanhata vinasayamaya
taman minisungen kira ganna vita sampurnayenma kiragannoya
kira dena vita ho mæna dena vita adu kara deti
niyata vasayenma taman nægituvanu labannan bava ovuhu nositanno da
mahat vu dinayaka
edina minissu sakala lokaye paramadhipati idiriye nægi sitinu æta
noeseya. niyata vasayenma aparadhakaruvange lekhanaya sijjinhi ætteya
(nabivarayanani!) sijjin yanu kumak dæyi numba va dænuvat kale kumak da
(eya minisage siyalu kriyavan gæna) liyana lada varta potaki
musa bas pavasannan hata edina vinasayaya
movun vu kali viniscaya dinaya boru karamin sititi
simava ikmava giya sæma papatarayakuma misa venat kisivek eya boru nokaranneya
apage vadan ohu veta parayana karanu labana vita (meya) pærænnange manahkalpita kata yæyi ohu pavasayi
noeseya. namut ovun upayamin siti dæ (magin) ovunge hadavat mata mala bændi æta
noeseya. niyata vasayenma ovuhu edina ovunge paramadhipatigen tira dama(min ven kara)nu labannoya
tavada niyata vasayenma ovuhu nirayehi pivisenno veti
inpasuva “numbala boru karamin siti dæ meya ve” yæyi kiyanu læbe
noeseya. niyata vasayenma dæhæmiyange lekhanaya illiyiyinhimaya
tavada illiyiyin yanu kumak dæyi numba va dænuvat kale kumak da
(eya) liyana lada varta potaki
(deva) samipatayo eyata saksi darannoya
niyata vasayenma dæhæmiyo sæpa pahasukam pirunu svargayanhi veti
kavicci matata vi (siri) narambamin sitinnoya
(ovunata læbunu) sæpa pahasukam hi siriyava numba ovunge muhunu tulin dæna ganu æta
mudra karana lada amrtayen ovuhu povanu labannoya
ehi mudrava kasturi ya. eheyin taranga vadinnata apeksa karannan e tula taranga vaditva
tavada ehi misranaya tasnimgenya
eya deva samipatayin eyin panaya karana ulpatakya
niyata vasayenma aparadha kala aya visvasa kalavun pilibanda va sinahasemin sitiyoya
tavada ovun pasu karamin giya vita ovuhu ekineka atara æs konin ingi kota samaccal kara gannoya
tavada ovuhu ovunge janaya veta hæri giya vita samaccal karamin satutu vannan lesa hæri giyoya
tavada ovuhu ovun va dutu vita “sæbævinma movun mulavuvanmaya” yæyi pavasati
tavada ovun mata araksakayin lesa movuhu evanu nolæbuvoya
eheyin ada dina visvasa kala aya, ( pratiksepakayin melovedi visvasa vantayinta sinasunak men ovun) desa bala sinasennoya
suva pahasu kavicci mata vi (siri) narambannoya
pratiksepakayo taman karamin siti dæ sandaha prativipaka denu læbuvo da? (yæyi vimasanu labananneya)
ahasa pæli yana vita
eya ehi paramadhipatita avanata vu vita. eyata (ese sidu vima) niyama karana ladi
mahapolova samatala karanu læba
eya ehi tula æti dæ bæhæra kara his vi
eya ehi paramadhipatita avanata vu vita. eyata (ese sidu vima) niyama karana ladi
aho minisa! niyata vasayenma numbage paramadhipati veta numba dædi se prayatna daranneki. ebævin numba ohu va munagæsennehiya
evita tama varta pota tamange dakunatata denu læbu aya vu kali
ohu pahasu vimasumakin matu vimasanu labanu æta
tavada ohu tama janaya veta pritiyata pat va hæri yanu æta
tavada tama varta pota tamange konda pitupasata denu læbu aya vu kali
ohu vinasaya yæyi matu vælapenu æta
tavada ohu (niraye) ævilena ginnata pivisenu æta
niyata vasayenma ohu tama pavulehi pritiyata pat vuveku lesa sitiyeya
niyata vasayenma ohu (maranayen pasu) kisiviteka apasu nopæminennemaya yæyi situveya
ese nova, sæbævinma ohuge paramadhipati ohu pilibandava nitya niriksakayeku lesa sitiyeya
tavada gommana mata da mama divurami
ratriya ha eya vælanda gat dæ mata da, (mama divurami)
candraya purnatvayata pat vana vita e mata da mama (divurami)
sæbævinma piyavaren piyavara numbala (idiriyata) gaman karannehumaya
eheyin ovuhu visvasa nokara sitimata ovunata kumak sidu vi da
tavada ovunata alkuranaya parayanaya karanu læbu vita ovuhu (allahta sirasa nama) sujud nokarati
namut (deva visvasaya) pratiksepa kala aya eya boru yæyi pavasannoya
tavada ovun (tama hadavat tula) sangavana dæ pilibanda allah mænavin dannaya
eheyin vedaniya danduvamak pilibanda numba ovunata subharamci pavasanu
namut visvasa kara dæhæmi dæ kalavun hæra ovunata akhanda (yaha) pratiphala æta
graha mandalayan gen yut ahasa mata da
pratigna denu læbu dinaya mata da
saksi daranna ha saksi daranu labana de mata da divuramin.(pavasami)
agal væsiyo (allah visin) vinasa karanu læbuvoya
indhana valin yukta ginnak ve
ovuhu e mata vadi vi sitiyoya
ekal hi visvasa kalavunhata ovun karamin siti dæ ovuhu narambamin (e mata vadi vi sitiyoya)
prasamsalabhi sarva balaparakrama allah va ovun visvasa kirime hetuven misa ovuhu ovungen pali nogattoya
ahas ha mahapolovehi rajya balaya satu (allah va ovun visvasa kirime hetuven) tavada allah siyalu dæ kerehi saksi daranna ya
niyata vasayenma visvasa karana piriminta ha visvasa karana kantavanta himsa kara, pasu va pascattapa novuvan vana ovunata niraye danduvama da tavada ovunata pilissena ginnehi danduvama da æta
sæbævinma visvasa kota yahakam kalavun vana ovunata ita pahalin gamgavan gala basina (svarga) uyan æta. eyayi ati mahat jayagrahanaya
niyata vasayenma numbage paramadhipatige grahanaya ita dædi ya
(purvadarsayak nomæti va) nirmanaya karanne da yali sakas karanne da ohumaya
ohu ati ksamasili ya. mahat dayalu ya
kirtimat arshi (rajyayehi) himikaru ohu ya
ohu sitana de mænavin karanna ya
(nabivaraya) numbata prajavange puvata pæminiye da
firavun ha samud (prajavange puvata pæminiye da)
namut pratiksepa kalavun boru kirimehi ya
tavada allah ovunge pasupasin velaganna ya
namut eya kirtimat kuranaya ve
(kisindu venasakata bandun novena akarayata) phalakayehi lekhana gata kara araksa kara æta
ahasa mata da tarik mata da divuramin
tarik yanu kumak dæyi numbata dænum dunne kumak da
(eya) andura pasaru karamin bæbalena tarakavaki
niriksakayekugen tora va kisidu atmayak nomæta
minisa taman mavanu læbuve kumakin dæyi sita balatva
vidina jalayen ohu mavanu læbuveya
konda ha papu pedesa atarin eya pita ve
sæbævinma ohu nævata ohu va genva gænimata saktivantaya ya
rahasya dæ piriksanu labana dina
evita kisidu balayak ho kisidu udav karuveku ho ohuta nomæta
tavada (varsava nævata) nævata laba dena svabhavayen yut ahasa mata da divuramin
pælim svabhavayen yut mahapolova mata da divuramin
sæbævinma eya tiranatmaka vadanaki
tavada eya saradamak nove
sæbævinma ovun kumantranayak kumantranaya karati
mama da sælasumak sælasum karami
ebævin pratiksepakayinta numba avakasaya denu. tavada ovunata svalpa kalakata avakasaya salasa denu
numbage utkrsta paramadhipatige namaya pivituru karanu
ohu (siyalla) mava nisi lesa sakas kaleya
tavada ohu(siyalla) nirnaya kara (eva labagænimata) mangada pen vuyeya
tavada (sivpavan sandaha) tana bim pita kale ohuya
pasu va eya (viyælunu) kalu pæhæti ipænali bavata pat kaleya
api obata (alkuranaya) matuvata kiyava penvannemu. ebævin numba eya amataka nokarannehiya
allah abhimata vu dæ hæra (an kisivak) numba amataka nokarannehiya. sæbævinma ohu sængavunu dæ da prakata dæ da danna ya
tavada api pahasu va veta numbata pahasu karavannemu
ebævin sihipat kirima (asannata) prayojanavat ve nam numba sihipat karanu
kavareku (allahta) biya vanne da ohu sihipat kara ganu æta
tavada abhagyavantaya eya valakva ganneya
ohu (niraye) mahat ginnata piviseyi
pasu va ohu ehi maranayata pat noveyi. jivat da noveyi
sæbævinma (kuranaye upadesa magin) pivituru kara gat aya jayagrahanaya kaleya
tavada ohu tama paramadhipatige namaya sihipat kara pasu va salataya da itu kaleya
namut numbala melova jivitaya tora gannehuya
(melova jivitayata vada) matu lova utum ya. tavada sada pavatinnaki
satya vasayenma meya purva lekhanayanhi (sandahan va) æta
ibrahim ha musage lekhanayanhi (sandahan va) æta
(vinasaya) avaranaya karana siddhiya pilibanda puvata numba veta pæminiyeda
edina (ætæm ayage) muhunu yatahat pahat va
vehesa va vidavata pat va tibe
ævilena ginnata eva(ema muhunu) piviseyi
(ovun) unu diya ulpatin povanu labayi
ovunata katu sahita saka misa venat kisivak nomæta
eya (ovun va) pustimat nokarayi. tavada kusaginna (nivanna)ta upakara noveyi
(ætæm) muhunu satutin piri tibe
evayehi sramayan pilibanda va trptiyata pat va
usas svarga uyanhi (satutin sititi)
ehi puhu vadan sravanaya nokarati
ehi gala yana ulpat da
ehi gala yana ulpat da
(bimata) tabana lada gurulettu da
viyana lada kotta da
diga harina lada bumuturunu da æta
otuva desa eya kese mavanu læbuve dæyi da, ovuhu niriksa kota bæliya yutu noveda
ahasa desa eya kese osavanu læbuve dæyi da, (ovuhu niriksa kota bæliya yutu noveda)
kandu desa eya kese savi karanu læbuve dæyi da (ovuhu niriksa kota bæliya yutu noveda)
mahapolova desa eya kese vyapta karanu læbuve dæyi da ovuhu niriksa kota bæliya yutu noveda
eheyin numba sihipat karanu. niyata vasayenma numba sihipat karanneku pamani
numba ovun kerehi balaya darannek novannehiya
kavareku pitupamin pratiksepa kale da ohu kerehi pamanak misa
sæbævinma allah (pitupamin pratiksepa kala) ohuta atimahat danduvamakin danduvam karanneya
sæbævinma ovunge nævata pæminima apa veta ya
pasuva sæbævinma ovun (kala kriyavan) ge gananaya apa mata ya
arunodaya mata da divuramin
dasa ratriyan mata da (divuramin)
iratte ha otte mata da (divuramin)
ratriya gevi yana vita e mata da divuramin
nuvana æti ayata ehi (pramanavat) divurumak æt da
iram nagaraye ad janayata numbage paramadhipati kavara ayurin katayutu kale dæyi numba nodutuvehi da
eya kulunu valin yuktaya
eva men kisivak (venat) desayanhi nirmanaya karanu nolæbu (ha)
nimnayanhi gal parvata kænu samud janayatat, (numbage paramadhipati kavara ayurin katayutu kale dæyi numba nodutuvehi da)
riti valata himikam pæ firavun(ge vargayata)t (numbage paramadhipati kavara ayurin katayutu kale dæyi numba nodutuvehi da)
ovuhu desayanhi sima va ikmava særisæruha
ovuhu ehi kalahakam adhika lesa sidu kaloya
eheyin numbage paramadhipati ovun mata vedanave kasaya (danduvama) heluveya
sæbævinma numbage paramadhipati supariksakari va sitinnaya
enamut minisa vu kali, ohuge paramadhipati ohu va pariksavata lak kara, pasu va ohuta upakara kara ohuta dayadayan pirinæmu kalhi “mage paramadhipati mata upakara kaleya” yæyi ohu pavasayi
tavada ohu va pariksavata lak kara pasu va ohuge jivana sampat ohuta sima kala kalhi evita ohu “mage paramadhipati mata avaman kaleya” yæyi pavasayi
noeseya, numbala anathayata upakara nokarannehuya
tavada numbala dugiyata ahara sæpayima kerehi diri noganvannehuya
tavada numbala urumayan (nityanukula novana paridi) dædi lesa anubhava karannehuya
emenma apramana lædiyavakin dhanayata ælum karannehuya
ese nova, mahapolova kæbali kæbali vasayen sunu visunu karanu læbu kalhi
tavada malakvaru pelin pelata (pela gæsi) sitiyadi numbage paramadhipati pæminenneya
tavada edina niraya gena enu læbe. edina minisa sihipat karayi. ema sihipat kirima ohuta kese (nam phalak) vanne da
“aho! mama mage jivitaya venuven kal æti va (yahakam) sidu karannata tibuna nove” dæyi ohu pavasayi
edina ohuge danduvama men kisivek danduvam nokarayi
tavada ohuge bændima men kisivek (aparadhakaruvan va) bænda notabanneya
“aho sænasumata pat atmaya
numba trptiyata pat vanneku lesa da trptiyata pat karanu labanneku lesa da numbage paramadhipati veta hæri yanu
evita (allah mese pavasayi) numba mage gættan atarata yanu
tavada mage svargayata pivisenu
mema nagaraya (makkah va) mata da divurami
numba mema nagaraye rændi sitiya di
piya ha ohu janita kala dæ mata da divurami
sæbævinma api minisa va dædi duskaratavaka mævvemu
ohu kerehi kisiveku balaya nodaranu ætæyi ohu sitanne da
mama adhika vasayen dhanaya nasti kalemi yæyi ohu pavasayi
ohu va kisivek nodutuve yæyi ohu sitanne da
api ohuta æs deka æti nokalemu da
diva da detol da (æti nokalemu da)
tavada api ohuta (honda naraka yana) mavat deka veta manga penvuyemu
enamut ohu akaba va taranaya kirimata væyam nokaleya
akaba va yanu kumakdæyi numba va dænuvat kale kumakda
(eya) vahaleku nidahas kirima ho
saginnen yut dinaka ahara sæpayima ve
samipakam æti anatha gnatiyekuta ho (ahara sæpayima ve)
asarana vu dugiyekuta (ahara sæpayima ve)
pasu va ohu visvasa kara ivasima pilibanda ekinekata upades demin karuna dayava pilibandava da ekinekata upades dun aya aturin keneku bavata pat ve
ovuhumaya dakunata parsavayin vanno
tavada apage vadan pratiksepa kalavun vana ovuhumaya vamat parsavayin vanno
ovunhata molavana lada (niraye) ginna æta
hiru ha ehi prabhava mata divuramin
eya pasupasin hamba yana sandu mata da
dahavala eya op namvana vita eya mata da
ratriya eya avaranaya karana vita eya mata da
ahasa ha eya goda nægu dæ mata da
polova ha eya vyapta kala dæ mata da
atmaya ha eya sækasu dæ mata da divuramin
ohu e(ma atma)yata ehi napura gænada, ehi dharmikatava gænada hængima æti kaleya
sæbævinma kavarek e(ma atma)ya pavitra kara gatte da ohu jaya læbiya
tavada sæbævinma kavarek eya papayehi gil vuye da ohu parajayata pat viya
samud janaya tama sima ikmava aparadha karamin (eya) boru yæyi pævasuvoya
ovunge abhagyavantaya nægi siti vita
meya allahge otu denaya. (meyata himsa nokaranu) yæyi da uge pæn sthanaya (pæn bimen novalakvanna) yæyi” da allahge dutaya pævasuveya

evita ovuhu ohu va boru kaloya. pasuva uge nahara kapa dæmuvoya. ebævin ovunge paramadhipati ovunge papaya hetuven ovun mata vedanava pahala kara sunu visunu kaleya. emenma ovun va samatala kara dæmuveya
tavada ovunge avasanaya gæna ohu biyavanne næta
ratriya avaranaya vana vita e mata divuramin
dahavala (diptiya) heli vana vita e mata da
pirimiya ha gæhæniya mævu ohu mata da divuramin
niyata vasayenma numbalage utsahayan vividhaya
eheyin parityaga kara, biya bætimat vi
yahapata gena saksat kala keneku vu kali
api ohuta pahasuva vetata pahasu karannemu
tavada masuru vi, taman avasyatavangen tora (svayam purita) yæyi sita
visista de asatyaya kala keneku vu kali
api ohu va duskaratava vetata pahasu karannemu
tavada ohu (nirayata) æda vætunu vita ohuge dhanaya ohuta prayojanaya gena denne næta
niyata vasayenma yahamanga ætte apa vetaya
tavada niyata vasayenma elova ha melova ætte apahata ya
eheyin mama numbalata ævilena ginna pilibanda va anaturu angavami
abhagyavantaya hæra vena kisivek ehi pivisa dævenne næta
ohu (apage deva vadan) asatya kara pitupæveya
tavada biya bætimat aya va sæbævinma api mudava gannemu
(ovuhu kavrunda yat) taman pivituru vemin tama dhanaya ( allah udesa) pirinama pivituru veti
tama asala tibi pirinamanu læbu kisidu sampatak (vena) kisiveku venuven noviya
uttaritara tama paramadhipatige muhunata (trptiya apeksaven) misa
tavada ohu matu trptiyata pat vanu æta
peravaru va mata divura (pavasami)
tavada ratriya (dahavala) avaranaya karana vita, e mata divuramin (pavasami)
numbage paramadhipati numba va atahæra dæmuve næta. emenma ohu amanapa vuye da næta
sæbævinma, arambhayata vada avasanaya numbata vadat yahapat ya
tavada numbage paramadhipati numbata matuvata pirinamanu æta. evita numba trptiyata pat vanu æta
ohu numba va anathayeku lesa dæka numbata rækavaranaya nodunneda
tavada numba va ataramam vuveku lesa dutuveya. evita ohu manga penvuyeya
tavada ohu numba va avasyatava ætteku lesa dutuveya. evita ohu svayamposita kaleya
eheyin anathayata katuka lesa nosalakanu
tavada ayadinna va palava noharinu
tavada numbage paramadhipatige asirvadayan gæna numba prakasa karanu
api numbage hadavata numbata pulul nokalemu da
numbage bara api numbagen ivat kalemu
(eya) numbe pita talamin tibuni
tavada numbage kirtiya api numbata usas kalemu
ebævin niyata vasayenma duskaratava samanga pahasu va æta
sæbævinma duskaratava samanga pahasu va æta
ebævin, numba (numbage laukika katayutu) avasan kala vita (matulova katayutu sandaha) nægi sitinu
tavada numbage paramadhipati veta yomu vanu
attikka ha oliv mata da
sinayi kanda mata da
abhayadayi mema nagaraya mata da divuramin
sæbævinma api minisa va ita alamkara hædayakin mævvemu
pasu va pahatvuvangen vada pahat vu ayeku bavata api nævata pat kalemu
visvasa kota yahakam kalavun hæra, ovunata avasan novana pratiphala æta
in pasu va viniscaya boru yæyi numbata pævasuve kumak da
viniscakaruvangen maha viniscayakaru allah noveda
mævu numbage paramadhipatige namayen kiyavanu
ohu minisa va le kætiyen mævveya
ati gauravaniya numbage paramadhipatige namayen kiyavanu
ohu panhinden (livimata) igænvuyeya
ohu minisata taman nodæna siti dæ igænvuyeya
noeseya, niyata vasayenma minisa simava ikmava yanneya
taman svadhina yæyi ohu sitanneya
niyata vasayenma nævata hæri yanuye numbage paramadhipati vetaya
ohu va valakvana aya va numba dutuvehida
gætta salataya itu karana vita
ohu yahamangehi sitima numba dutuvehida
nætahot biya bætimatbhavaya pilibanda ana kara sitima (numba dutuvehida)
tavada ohu (satyaya) boru kara pitupæma numba dutuvehi da
niyata vasayenma allah dakinne yæyi ohu nodæna sitiyeda
noeseya. ohu eyin novælakune nam api idiri nalal kes rodin (ohu va) ædagena ennemu
enam væradi karamin da borukaramin da siti (ohuge) nalal kes rodini
ebævin ohu ohuge kændavum karuvan(vana udavkaruvan)va kændavatva
matuvata api da apage (niraye bharakara malakvarun vana) zabaniyavarun va kændavannemu
noeseya. numba ohuta avanata novanu. numbage (paramadhipatita) sajada karanu. tavada ohuta samipa venu
niyata vasayenma api eya balagatu ratriyehi pahala kalemu
balagatu ratriya kumakdæ yi numba va dænuvat kale kumakda
balagatu ratriya masa dahasakata vada utumya
malakvarun ha maha atmaya (jibril) tama paramadhipatige anumætiyen sæma karunakma gena ehi pahala vanneya
santiyayi ! eya arunodaya uda vana kalaya tek pavatiyi
veda grantha satu janaya ha adesa tabannan aturin vu pratiksepa kala aya taman veta pæhædili sadhakaya pæminena tek (pratiksepa kirimen) ivatvanno novuha
enam pivituru karana lada patrika kiyavana allahgen (ema pæhædili sadhakaya) vu deva dutaya ya
ehi niværadi niti riti æta
tavada veda granthaya pirinamanu læbu janaya ovunata pæhædili sadhakaya pæminimen pasu va misa ovuhu ven va nogiyaha
pivituru dahama allahta puda karamin ohu va næmadimatat salataya sthapita kirimatat zakat pirinæmimatat misa ovuhu ana karanu nolæbuvoya. tavada rju dahama vanuye eyayi
sæbævinma pustaka lat janaya ha adesa tabannan aturin vu pratiksepa kalavun nira ginnehiya. ovuhu ehi sadatanikayo veti. ovunmaya mævim aturin ita ayahapatma mævima vanuye
sæbævinma visvasa kota dæhæmi kriyavan kalavun vana ovuhumaya mævim aturin srestha vanno

ovunge paramadhipati abiyasa vu ovunge pratiphala vanuye pahalin gamgavan gala basna adn nam svarga uyanya. ovuhu ehi sadahatama sadatanikayo veti. allah ovun va piligatteya. ovuhuda ohu va piligattoya. eya tama paramadhipatita biya vu ayataya
mahapolova ehi kampanayen kampanaya karanu læbu vita
mahapolova ehi æti bara bæhæra kala vita
eyata kumak vi ætdæ yi minisa pavasayi
edina eya ehi toraturu pilibanda danva sitiyi
sæbævinma numbe paramadhipati eyata dænum dun bavata
edina tama kriyavan dæka ganu pinisa janaya kandayam vasayen pitat va pæmineyi
eheyin kavarek anuvak taram pramanayakin yahapatak kara ætte da ohu eya dæka gani
kavarek anuvak taram pramanayakin ayahapatak kara ætteda ohu eya dæka gani
hati damamin vegayen diva yana dæ mata divuramin
kura gætimen gini pupuru namvana dæ matada
tavada aluyamehi akramanaya karana dæ matada divuramin
evita emagin un duvili namvamin
kandayam vasayen (saturan) mædata piviseti
niyata vasayenma minisa tama paramadhipatita gunamakuya
tavada ættenma ohu eyata saksikaruvek ve
tavada ættenma ohu vastuvata dædi lesa ælum karannek ve
namut minivalaval tula æti dæ pita karanu labana vaga ohu nodanne da
tavada hadavat tula æti dæ heli karanu labana vaga (ohu nodanne) da
niyata vasayenma edina ovunge paramadhipati ovun pilibanda va sarva gnaniya
kampanaya æti karana siduvimaki
kampanaya æti karana siduvima kumak da
kampanaya æti karana siduvima kumakdæ yi numbata dænum dunne kumakda
edina minisa visiri yana merun men vanu æta
tavada kandu piranu læbu lom men vanu æta
ebævin tama (yahakamhi) tulava barin vædi vu aya nam
ohu trptimat jivitayehi pasu veyi
tavada tama (yahakamhi) tulava barin sæhællu vi giya aya nam
ohuge vasasthanaya haviya ve
tavada eya (haviya) kumakdæ yi oba va dænuvat kale kumakda
(eya) dædi usnayen yut ginnaki
taranga vadimin (vastuva) adhika lesa ræs kirima (allah va sihipat kirimen) numbala va venatakata yomu kara æta
numbala minivalaval hamu vana turu
ese nova, numbala matu dæna gannehuya
yali ese nova, numbala matu dæna gannehuya
ese nova numbala sthavara dænumin dæna gannehu nam
numbala sæbævinma niraya dakinu æta
pasuva numbala eya tirasara lesa dakinu æta
tavada edina numbala (bhukti vinda vu) sæpa sampat pilibanda va vimasanu labanu æta
kalaya mata divuramin
sæbævinma minis vargaya alabhayehi pasu veti
namut (satyaya) visvasa kara, dæhæmi kriyavan itu kara, tavada satya pilibanda ekinekata upades di, tavada ivasima pilibandava da ekinekata upades dun aya hæra
dos nagamin ninda bas kiyana apahasa karamin kelam kiyana sæma kenekutama vinasaya at veva
ohu dhanaya ræs kota eya ganan karannekya
niyata vasayenma ohuge dhanaya ohu va sadakal jivat karanu ætæ yi ohu sitayi
ese nova sæbævinma ohu hutamave hi helanu labayi
hutama va yanu kumakdæ yi numbala dænuvat kale kumakda
eya avulanu læbu allahge ginnaya
eya sit mata ebikam karayi
sæbævinma eya ovun vata kara gannaki
us kulunu tula (hirakara)
numbage paramadhipati æt senava samanga katayutu kale kesedæ yi numba nudutuvehida
ovunge kumantranaya mula kirimehi pat nokaleda
tavada ohu ovun mata ramcu vasayen kurullan evveya
un ovun mata pulussana lada mæti valin vu gal heluveya
evita ovun va ka damana lada piduru men ohu pat kaleya
kureyisvarunhata hurupurudukam æti kirima venuven da
sita ha grisma rtuvan hi (vyapara katayutu sandaha) tavalamehi yæmata ovunhata hurupurudukam æti kirima venuven da
mema nivase paramadhipatita ovun næmadum karatva
kusaginnen (siti) ovunata ahara pirinama biyen (siti) ovunata araksava pirinæmuve ohuya
viniscaya dinaya boru karana aya numba dutuvehi da
enam ohu kavarekda yat anathaya va palava hariyi
tavada duppatage aharaya (laba dima) pilibanda va diri noganvayi
emenma salataya itu karannanhata vinasaya at veva
ovuhu kavarahu da yat ovuhu tamange salataya pilibanda va sælakillak dakvanno novuha
an ayata penva (purasaram doda)nnan vuha
novatina alpa vastun (piri næmima) pava valakvanno vuha
niyata vasayenma api numbata asimita sampat pirinæmuvemu
ebævin numba numbage paramadhipatita salataya itu kara numba (allah venuvenma) satekuge gela kapa harinu
niyata vasayenma numbata dos pavaranna vana ohumaya pelapata nomætta
(nabi muhammad) pavasanu aho deva pratiksepakayini
numbala namadina dæ mama nonamadimi
tavada numbala da ma namadina dæ namadinno novannehuya
tavada numbala næmadu dæ mama namadinnek novuyemi
ma namadina dæ numbala da namadinno novuha
numbalata numbalage dahamaya. mata mage dahamaya
allahge upakaraya ha (makka) jayagrahanaya pæmini vitada
tavada allahge dahamata janaya kandayam vasayen pivisenu numba dakina vita da
numba numbage paramadhipatige prasamsava tulin ohu va pivituru karanu. tavada ohugen samava ayæda sitinu. niyata vasayenma ohu atiksamasili viya
abu lahabge dæt vinasa veva! ohu da vinasa veva
ohuge dhanaya da ohu ipæyu dæ da ohuta phalak gena dunne næta
matuvata ohu agni jalaven yut nirayata pivisa dævenu æta
(ohu da) dara usulanniyak vu ohuge biriya da (agni jalaven yut nirayata pivisa dævenu æta)
æyage gelehi indi kendi valin yut kambayaki
(nabi muhammad) pavasanu. ohu enam allah ekiyaya
allah svadhinaya. (kisima avasyatavayak nomættaya)
ohu janita nokaleya. tavada janita karanu nolæbuveya
tavada ohuta samana kisiveku noviya
(nabi muhammad) numba pavasanu. arunodaye paramadhipati vetin mama araksava patami
ohu mævu dæhi haniyen da
tavada andura vihidunu vita ehi haniyen da
tavada gæta mata pimbinniyange haniyen da
irsya karanna irsya kala vita ehi haniyen da (araksava patami)
(nabi muhammad) numba pavasanu. minisunge paramadhipati vetin mama araksava patami
(ohu) minisunge raju (ve)
(ohu) minisunge deviya (da ve)
(napuru) kiliti kukus ætikarannage haniyen (ohugen araksava patami)
ohu minisunge sit tula kutuhalayan æti karayi
(mevannan) jinnun ha minisun atarada sititi
